params.812: Reach level 5 in the Defence skill.
params.813: Ensure your combat style is set to provide Defence XP. The Cows north east of Lumbridge are suitable targets to fight.
params.814: Train your Defence to level 5 by fighting nearby monsters!|Equip your armour and weapon.|Ensure your combat style is set to provide Defence XP.|Take some food to keep your hitpoints high.|The Cows north east of Lumbridge are suitable targets to fight. Cows drop beef which you can cook to use as low-level food. Cows also drop Cowhides, you can tan the hided and use them to train your crafting skill.|You can bury bones to gain Prayer experience.
params.823: Set your combat style to the correct stance to gain Defence experience.
params.936: A hint arrow has been added above a Cow you could attack.
params.938: Look for a Cow near the hint arrow location.
